name: Seth Manoharlalji & Mrs. Angela Agrawal (Bhiwapurkar) Charitable Trust

address: Dighori Uddan Pul Square Ring Road

briefDescription: Providing employment uplifting the health of lower strata of society to produce productive citizens of India. establishing hospital mobile health units ambulance.establishing educational institutes and training institutes. providing work experience to train youth to prepare them  for the competitive atmosphere, to bring the social change through different health campaigning
